reviews.review_msg: Deanna's a very charismatic prof, and the material she provides in her class is very valuable, but what she wants out of students can seem a bit scattered at times. Don't take the syllabus as gospel; things might change, and it can be confusing.
She was excellent! Very organized and invested in the course and her students. Went out of her way to make sure students understood assignments and expectations.

Deanna is a very compassionate professor. Class was sometimes boring and she stutters a lot but she had cool activities throughout the semester which really help us learn. At first I thought the textbooks sucked, but both of them are amazing! I wouldn't mind taking another class with Deanna again. :)

Deanna is a bright, friendly, and very involved professor. She cares about her students and is extremely helpful. I was extremely shocked by the ratings of all the ENGL101 students who were so concerned about race. I loved this prof, taking another course with her just because she's great.
really great teacher lots of enthusiasm

The best prof I've had so far. Very understanding, very enthusiastic about the material, and very helpful with her studetns. I fully enjoyed this course and would definitely take another class with her!
